task_specs.title: Implement Advanced Search & Filtering System
task_specs.description: Build comprehensive product search with Elasticsearch integration, multi-faceted filtering (price, category, brand, ratings), search result ranking algorithm, auto-complete, suggestions, and search analytics. Must achieve <200ms response time, 95% accuracy, and support 10+ concurrent filter combinations.

task_specs.title: Integrate Payment Processing Gateway
task_specs.description: Implement secure payment gateway with Stripe (primary) and PayPal (fallback), credit card tokenization, PCI DSS compliance, fraud detection hooks, refund/chargeback handling. Must support zero raw card storage, end-to-end encryption, transaction audit logging, and 15+ currencies.

task_specs.title: Build Inventory Management System
task_specs.description: Implement real-time inventory tracking across multiple warehouses, stock level monitoring with alerts, automated reorder triggers, inventory reconciliation, product variants management, and stock reservation. Must support <5s sync latency, 100k+ SKUs, and 3+ warehouse locations.

task_specs.title: Develop ML-Based Recommendation Engine
task_specs.description: Build product recommendation system with collaborative filtering, content-based filtering, real-time updates, A/B testing framework, and performance metrics. Depends on search system and user behavior tracking.

task_specs.title: Implement Order Management Workflow
task_specs.description: Build complete order lifecycle management including placement, confirmation, status tracking, shipping integration (UPS, FedEx, USPS), returns/exchanges, and order history. Integrates with payment, inventory, and email notification systems.

task_specs.title: Setup Architecture Infrastructure
task_specs.description: Establish microservices architecture for payment and inventory, event-driven architecture for order updates, Redis for caching/sessions, PostgreSQL for transactional data, and Elasticsearch for search.
